text: <!channel>: spoke w/ peter from yesterday on the table cloth - he recommends a dark blue, grey. Or, maybe something earthy - ideally, something matte, not shiny fabric without a conspicuous pattern. Do either of you have a table cloth that fits this description? If not, I can hunt one down today! Let me know.
I do not
I don't either
i'll pick one up today

<!channel>: so it looks like casting tomorrow will run up against your parent-teacher conference, rob. it was my understanding alison was going to reach out & give us some time options to choose from - but maybe the models only had one option? All in all, casting is set up for 330p tomorrow.
<@U02F90CRQ>: know this may be an issue w/ your afternoon plans but let me know if you can make it and <@U026NB2U2> it looks like your afternoon's open - will you be able to attend?
What happened to options?
she was supposed to reach out and send us at least 2 options
Rob should be there.
Then let's call them on their bullshit.
I could've told you that would happen.
Ugh.  I can't miss the conference.
I literally told her any time but what she has chosen
ok
I know why.  It's between school and dinner.

Worst case scenario, we have the casting director manage their auditions and record them.  I've cast much bigger projects than this remotely.  And I can talk personally to the casting director to make sure he/she is clear what action we want to see between them.
Can we try Friday?
Too late?
Let me know if I should send this - here's what I'm thinking

Hey Alison -

As we mentioned yesterday, our creative director has an afternoon appointment on Thursday that's a tough to get out of - and, as the creative director, we do need him at the shoot as much as possible. We definitely understand the afternoon might be the best time for the models, as it's between school & dinner, but I thought yesterday we chatted about you guys sending us a few options for times after you had a chance to talk with the casting agency? If there's any wiggle room in the casting session, can you please let us know?
Yeah, let's do that. Rob, is Friday too late? Maybe we try for Friday?
My meeting is from 4-4:30 in NE.  I can do this at 5.  I just pray the casting agency is local (and not in Beaverton or some shit like that)
Or I have all morning I can make available.
so send the message?
cool - let's send them specific times that work for us
otherwise we'll be lobbing options through 3 different tiers of companies
gotcha
rob - send me times that work for you & i'll fold them into my message.
I assume Ram and Intel need to see casting.  Am I wrong?  Maybe we can share headshots.
yeah - maybe we do send them headshots & photos of our selects
let's shoot for later tomorrow then
Literally any time tomorrow but the 90 minutes between 3:30 and 5.
so we have time to send our reco to Ram. and once we have a time confirmed, let's tell Ram that we'll be sending him our selects for casting tomorrow evening so we can make ac all friday

also - unrelated to this current thread but while I'm in this slack channel - Karen can you check in w/ Josh to see how he's doing? We should try to get the frame completed EOD tomorrow so we can try to mount it on Friday
Hey, Marce, would you be cool sending him our headshots and asking him to rank them in his order of preference?  I ask this because we have no time to react if he has any issues on Friday.
(and watching them act is for us more than him)
I'm sitting in the green chair over by the table top arcade system if you want to chat for minute
<@U026NB2U2>: lets chat on the frame - he's waiting on adx to get back to him. eod tomorrow sounds like an ideal. maybe more like friday sometime - josh is going to let me know more tomorrow.
any time tomorrow works for you, rob, just NOTHING from the time of 330-5?
I can send that over to Alison.
that's fine - as long as Josh is clear on Friday as the final deliverable and that we may need some time at my house on Friday to mount it
he's clear on that it's dependent on if somebody at adx can help him tomorrow.
talking w/ him now he's saying there are other places we can go to if needed.
he will know more in the morning
Yes to any time but 3:30PM-5PM (meaning I can start a session at 5, but not before)
@rob send me the headshots & I can send to Ram if that's cool w/ everyone.
i have them
so i'll send to ram tonight??
tonight, once we have a time for casting confirmed, we should send Ram a note that says "tomorrow evening, we'll send you our casting selects and we'll need your feedback/approval"
that way he knows it's coming from us and we don't have additional delays
tomorrow, after our casting, we should send him a note with our selects
because I don't trust anyone associated w/ Visual Aid at the moment, we should be taking photos / videos (grab a camera) tomorrow so that we can compile what we need to write that email quickly.
headshots (in a digital file) would also work for me if we have them
though we should still bring a camera to casting
back in my day, we used polaroids
but those don't exist anymore - so whatever the cool kids use these days
we should bring a notebook and take detailed notes on what we like about each of them so that you're not struggling to remember the difference between dad 17 and son 5
makes sense.

Unless she fucks us and says it has to happen at 3:30, I'm all over the casting, the notes, the video and the email that explains our selects.  And we'll send two so he can make a choice.  Luckily, we're only looking at 3 pairs. so the session shouldn't take too long.
which is what she basically said
i knew when i said that yesterday she didn't actually hear me
Is 3:30 still the only time available?
it is - because she never asked for another option
i just want her to ask - its her mistake.

Ok.  We can make this work.  But before we solve another problem of their creation, allow me to say these guys are a joke.  Total amateurs.  Even if you're losing money on this job and don't want to do it and whatever other reasons they might have for being so disengaged, this is a job with real money and real consequences for all involved.
All that said, we will take the lead on everything at this point.  We'll get it done and it will be great.
agree with you rob
<!channel>: isn't ram going to ask about what the mom looks like if i only send over the fathers/son combos?
Yeah. I can't wait to hear why James can't find a picture of his wife.
i have one - i can send that onward. it just wasn't a very good picture in comparison to the rest.
my mistake not his :wink:
